name: Chaoz.GitHub.io
body:
![Chao Zhang](https://d17oy1vhnax1f7.cloudfront.net/items/2D28423t0R1b0H0A2k3G/zc.jpg?v=aacf9781)
### Zhang, Chao[[CV](https://cl.ly/1w2s3r2w2J3E/download/CV%20ChaoZhang.pdf)]
* Add.: Department of Automation, Tsinghua University, Beijing, 100084, China
* Tel.: +86-18810456352
* Email: c-zhang15@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn

### Education
* B.S., Department of Automation, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China, 2015
* M.S. (Data Science Program), Department of Automation, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China, 2018

### Research Interest
* Deep Learning
* Computer Vision
* Event based Optimization

### Project Experience
* Development of Go AI Program, Research Intern, NovuMind Inc., Santa Clara, CA, U.S., May 2016-Aug. 2015
* Pedestrian Detection & Tracking, Researcher, Center for Intelligent and Networked Systems, Tsinghua University, Sept. 2015-Now
* Research on Smart Parking System, Visiting Scholar, Boston University, MA, U.S., July 2014-Sept. 2015
* Cyber Physical System for Smart Buildings, Lead Developer, May 2013-Aug. 2013

### Intern Experience
* Research Intern, NovuMind Inc., Santa Clara, CA, U.S., May 2016-Aug. 2015
* Research Visiting Scholar, Boston University, MA, U.S., July 2014-Sept. 2015
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
